name: Research Experience Undergraduate
desc: Designed a web-based tool to submit as an entry to VAST Challenge 2017. Collaborated with a group of 4 to develop and deploy a web-based service for Englewood. Learned how to develop and deploy Unity applications for CAVE2.

name: Research Intern
desc: Tested multiple websites to see which accessible web-commands are necessary for normal usage by disabling certain web standards and elements. Saved and analyzed data with Google Sheets.

name: Sophomore Level Student Peer Tutor
desc: Tutored an average of 5 students per week in classes of Programming Practicum, Data Structures, and Machine Organization; included material in C and Java.

name: Freshman Level Student Peer Tutor
desc: Tutored students in classes of Intro to Programming and Program Design; included material in C and Python.
